name: TOC'S Current Obsession
description: Black Currant touch of grape, a little fun going on in the background with Forest fruit, apricot because I wanted it in there with a touch of cream and sweetening it up with Super Sweet.
author: TOCMichelleHughes

reviews.text: This is amazing!! Been meaning to try it since i started my blackcurrant kick about a month ago and finally got around to it, it looks crazy in my m25 tank its like bluish purple but is nice and creamy with a little sweetness to pair with the sharper blackcurrant, i love it will mix again! Ty!
